root: ^Well well, hello there little man! How may this old fart serve you?
^Wait, haven't i just seen you in the saloon?
^Well yes and no. Yes because it looked like me, but no since it was not me. It's my goddamn twin brother from the same mother
^Well, that's something you dont see everyday. Anyway, he told me to get something from you, good sir.
^Oh yea he did, didnt he? Did you ask him if he had plans to pay me this time? Anything?
^That's none of my bussines, thats yalls bussines. Now, what is it that he needs?
^Last we talked he wanted a bucket of milk or somethin', but I dont know if im inclined to give it to 'im this time around.

ConvinceShopkeeper: ^If you think about it, this is an excellent bussines decision. I get what i want, you don't get what you want and he gets what he wants
^Wait, that came out wrong... uh, I mean-
^Oh goddamn man, you one of the worst bussines men around these parts. Now git out of here before I show you what these hips can do, boy.
^OUT! Go get my money from that halfsmart ditwit bartender
RomanceShopkeeper: ^Hey hey, there partner, wanna hop in my barrel and do a barrel roll?
^What kinda cowboy hollerin' was that? If it was actually good you might've left here with a little more than what you want,
^but after that line, get out of my shop. Go get my money and then come back, if you dare.
ActTough: ^Listen partner, i'm gonna get what I need for your brother. Wether that means beating it out of you with a broom or by taking it, I am going to get it.
^Alright alright you unusually small cowboy. Before you go around and punch this crate out under me, just take it.
^This bucket right here, is what he wants
MilkTaken: ^Good to know that you know how to make a proper deal. Than-
^wait, this is milk? What is this? Milk for a bartender? What does a bartender do with milk?
^How am I supposed to know? Maybe his customers like milk with their wine. People out here are different.
^Now take it and git. But bring money next time.
